head.title: Nigeria: Militants Take Hostages In Oilfield Attack

hedline.hl1: Nigeria: Militants Take Hostages In Oilfield Attack

abstract.p: Italian oil company Eni says 27 people, including 11 soldiers, are being held hostage at one of its oilfield stations in Nigeria day after facility was overrun by militants; invasion is in response to killing of eight people by troops guarding station last week (S)

block.p: The Italian oil company Eni said 27 people, including 11 soldiers, were being held hostage at one of its oilfield stations in Nigeria a day after the facility was overrun by militants. No one was killed in the attack on the station, known as Ogbainbiri. Eni said it was working with the local authorities to resolve the crisis. The invasion was apparently in response to the killing of eight people by troops guarding Ogbainbiri last week, security sources said.
